title: Ep 42: Grief with Kevin Christy
description:
We lose people, things and situations every day. Grief is an ongoing part of life (Yay!)  My guest Kevin Christy lost his father in a hiking accident 7 years ago. How is he doing now and how does one deal with loss? Also, do you have any happy songs on your ipod? Does Kevin belong to the Bones Brigade? You bet. 

@kevingchristy @christinap on twitter
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
